Offer Description: Get Rs. 200 OFF with SBI Credit Card

Use code SBICAB to get flat Rs. 200 off on your bus booking.
Offer valid on a minimum transaction value of Rs.2000 (excluding service charges and taxes).
Maximum discount per transaction is Rs.200.
The coupon code is valid only for payments made on Thursday or Friday during the offer period.
Discount is applicable once per SBI Credit Card, per month during the offer period.
Offer is exclusively valid for SBI Credit Card holders.
This offer cannot be combined with any other ongoing promotions or discounts.
AbhiBus reserves the right to disqualify any transaction or discontinue the promotion at any time without prior notice or liability.
